results.name: Triangle read by rows where T(m,n)=2mn + m + n - 3, 1<=n<=m.
comment: First column: A016777; second column: A016897; third column: A008589; fourth column: A017173. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2012
mathematica: t[n_,k_]:=2 n*k + n + k - 3; Table[t[n, k], {n, 20}, {k, n}]//Flatten (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2012 *)
program: (MAGMA) [(2*n*k + n + k - 3): k in [1..n], n in [1..11]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2012
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 18 2009
